Key Match Events: Jasson Dominguez hit his second home run of the season
Aaron Judge hit his 55th home run of the season
Gleyber Torres hit a solo homer
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees homered three times in their 7-4 win over the Oakland Athletics to complete the three-game series sweep
Others: Luis Gil was hurt by a pair of two out walks and he gave up two runs in the first
Clay Holmes ran into trouble in the bottom of the eighth, but Luke Weaver once again came on and got out of the inning
Clarke Schmidt (5-4, 2.37 ERA) takes the mound for the series opener against right-hander Dean Kremer (7-10, 4.19 ERA) in the next game against the Baltimore Orioles
